name: BFR Occlusion Training (30-15-15-15)
time_per_session_breakdown: 4 BFR sets, 30s rest each, cuff on entire time â‰ˆ5 min
overview_and_execution: Apply occlusion strap. Perform 30 reps, rest ~30s, 15 reps, rest, 15 reps, rest, 15 reps. Remove strap after all sets.
example_application: Leg Extension: 30,15,15,15 with ~20%1RM. Keep the muscle engorged with minimal rest.
important_notes: Improves hypertrophy at low loads. Watch for excessive pain/numbness. Good for joint-friendly isolation.
